channel.title: Change Server Ip
channel.description: I am a huge noob at coding and what not but currently my server ip in silab is 127.0.0.1 how do I change this so that it would be my no-ip.biz I have already created a no-ip.biz at no-ip.com, and I am running No-Ip DUC with my ip any help?

item.title: Change Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @iaboni iaboni
item.description:
@iaboni wrote:

Okay I understand now thanks for all the help, had no clue it was just my localhost, though it still doesnt work tried it on my home comp any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Change Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Did u know that 127.0.0.1 is localhost (For you only)

If you want ppl on your server you need to give them that ip of no-ip
Example
Privateserver.no-ip.com

Then they can logon the server
If that don’t work you need to portforward or if that dont work try to change google startpage to something else…
Google blocks somethimes internet connections Oo

EDIT: Dont ask me how to portforward, i dont know it =(

Read full topic

item.title: Change Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

He aleady has a no-ip that’s pointless. Iaboni you log into 127.0.0.1 or localhost to log into your server yourself. You don’t use your no-ip, other people use it to log into your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @Notoriouscape Notoriouscape
item.description:
@Notoriouscape wrote:

Maybe you need to create a host?
Follow this link https://www.no-ip.com/members/dns/host.php

Then fill out where it says hostname and put your server name or something or something you like…
then next to it is a box thing with no-ip.biz in it, click on it then choose one of the No-Ip - Free Domains.

Then put host type as DNS HOST(A),
Then Create Host at the bottem,
And refresh your no-ip DUC and your no-ip should be there, so check it then wait a few seconds
And it should be done.

Im sorry if this is wrong but thats how i did when i could host a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Server Ip
item.dc:creator: @jake2624 jake2624
item.description:
@jake2624 wrote:

silab is a website which has a web client for any server to use but you can not change the ip to yours so when someone goes on it your ip’s already there. if that’s what you mean, Or what do you mean …?

Read full topic
